# Skyabove - AI Marketing Agency

> Skyabove is a complete AI marketing agency offering comprehensive marketing, AI development, and automation services starting at $3,000/month.

## About Skyabove

Skyabove is an AI Marketing Agency with a global team of AI experts in the United States and Sri Lanka. We combine 25 years of marketing and business automation experience with 5+ years of deep AI expertise. We are masters of AI-powered marketing, staying on top of all new AI platforms and creation options.

## Services

All services are included in one comprehensive package starting at $3,000/month with a 3-month minimum commitment:

### Marketing Services
- Marketing strategy and campaign management
- AI-powered digital advertising (Google Ads, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn)
- Social media marketing and management
- Email marketing and automation
- Growth marketing and conversion optimization

### AI & Technology Services
- AI development and integration
- Marketing automation platforms
- Custom website development
- E-commerce integration
- CRM system setup
- API integrations

### Content & Creative Services
- AI-powered content creation
- SEO and local search optimization
- AI visibility optimization (ChatGPT, Claude, AI search engines)
- Design and branding
- Video and multimedia content

### Analytics & Reporting
- Data analytics and insights
- Performance reporting
- ROI tracking and optimization

## Results

Our clients achieve:
- 3.8x Average ROAS (Return on Ad Spend)
- 259% Average Revenue Growth
- 14 Days to First Campaign
- 24/7 Marketing Engine

## AI Expertise

We master all major AI platforms including:
- ChatGPT / OpenAI
- Claude / Anthropic
- Google Gemini
- Midjourney
- DALL-E
- Runway ML
- HeyGen
- Suno
- Perplexity
- And 35+ more AI tools

## Pricing

- Starting at $3,000/month
- 3-month minimum commitment
- Month-to-month after initial commitment
- All services included - no hidden fees
- You own everything we create
